content: knee high socks for when shorter socks just won t do take two balls of yarn or lots of leftovers and keep on knitting the basic 4ply knee high socks are constructed as top down socks with calf shaping and a heel flap and gusset the heel is knitted in heel stitch which creates a durable cushioned heel this pattern can be used on its own or in conjunction with the winwick mum sockalong tutorials which are available for free here https //bit ly/sockalong which makes them an ideal knit for beginners
